title: President launches ‘Green Teacher’ website
content: The 9th National Conference of the All-Island Professional Lecturers’ Association was held under the patronage of President Gotabaya Rajapaksa at the Nelum Pokuna Mahinda Rajapaksa Theatre in Colombo on Wednesday (16).The All Island Professional Lecturers’ Association (APLA) is an organization founded in 2004 by a group of tuition teachers from all over Sri Lanka.President Rajapaksa launched the ‘Green Teacher’ website and presented souvenirs to four former presidents and a member of the Association.
